Title: Bessie
Writer: Dee Rees (screenplay), Christopher Cleveland (screenplay), Bettina Gilois (screenplay), Dee Rees (story), Horton Foote (story)
Actors: Khandi Alexander, Michael Kenneth Williams, Tika Sumpter, Queen Latifah
Plot: The story of legendary blues performer Bessie Smith, who rose to fame during the 1920s and '30s.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 23 wins & 45 nominations.
